welcome_benefits: Free Taj Epicure, EazyDiner Prime, and Moneycontrol Pro Membership. 5,000 Reward Points on Spending Rs. 1 Lakh Within 30 Days of Card Issuance

Rewards Rate: 1 RP on Each Spend of Rs. 100. 0.70 RPs on Select Spends of Insurance, Utilities, Education and Rental Payments
Reward Redemption: Cash Credit 1 Reward Point = ₹ 0.50 or Partner Airmiles - 5 Reward Points = 4 AirMiles
Golf: 12 Complimentary Green Fee Waivers and Golf Lessons at Top Golf Courses in India

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹10 Lakh in a Card Anniversary Year
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% or a Minimum Charge of Rs. 300

product_details: This is a premium credit card.
The joining fee is Rs. 30,000 but annual charges are Rs. 10,000 from the second year.
This card carries zero forex charges.
Get free Moneycontrol Pro, EazyDiner, and Taj Epicure Memberships.
